videos.description: Jaylen Brown meets Jimmy Butler's lay-up attempt at the top and sends it right back to him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Brown packs Butler’s lay-up attempt) 2021/11/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Brown packs Butler's lay-up attempt

videos.description: Jayson Tatum throws a nice lob pass to Robert Williams who flushes it home.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum lobs up Williams for the alley-oop) 2021/11/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum lobs up Williams for the alley-oop

videos.description: Jimmy Butler shows off his body control with this and-1 finish.

videos.description: Bam Adebayo lobs it up to Jimmy Butler who finishes off the pass with a crafty layup.
